TopicTitle: Eve mission concept-wish to have feedback.

Articles.Content:
The concept: an orbiter lander combo which shall be launched to eve by an atlas v LV.

detailed concept:

orbiter:

aies explon-d with suncat-2 panels and biggest antenna (the long panels that rotate)

dmagic orbital science parts:

Anomalous signal scanner.

Magnometer boom.

Radio and plasma wave science antenna.

Panda jÃƒÂ¤ger parts:

flat goo analyzer

small goo container.

spectrometer.

4 basic science parts(AIES style)

lander: AIES round gold probe core with hexagonal deck, small engine and legs)

same panda jÃƒÂ¤ger parts as above

4 basic science parts (AIES)

Dmagic science parts:

core laser

surface scanning lazer.

Probe Parachute (FASA)

Tomorrow I'll build the mission according to this concept, fly it, post pics and a .craft. And clear up ambiguous part names with the more specific ones. Is their anything I should change before I build and run it?

Mods:

Dmagic Orbital Science.

Panda JÃƒÂ¤ger Laboratories.

ULA Atlas V 2.0

AIES Aerospace.

Athena II by ganinian.

JPLV by Ansur_nied.

(I'll have links too the last 2 and the 3rd mod).
Feedback? Is this a good mission plan?
